channel.description: Configuring Storage Advanced Exercise To work on this exercise, you need managed machines with an additional disk device: add a 10 GB second disk to host ansible2 and a 5 GB second disk to host ansible3. The exercise assumes the name of the second disk is /dev/sdb; if a different disk name is used in your configuration, change this according to your specifications. Exercise 15-3 Setting Up an Advanced Storage Solution
